'''[[Water]]''' is a fluid commonly found in the [[Overworld]]. It may also refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{ItemLink|Water Bucket}}, the item used to carry and place water.
* {{ItemLink|Potion of Water Breathing}}
** {{ItemLink|Splash Potion of Water Breathing}}
** {{ItemLink|Lingering Potion of Water Breathing}}
** {{ItemLink|Arrow of Water Breathing}} 
**{{EffectSprite|water-breathing}} [[Water Breathing]], the effect that prevents or delays drowning.
* {{ItemLink|Water Bottle}}, the base for all potions.
** {{ItemLink|Splash Water Bottle}}, the splash potion version of water bottles.
** {{ItemLink|Lingering Water Bottle}}, the lingering potion version of water bottles.
